snippet.title: Undying Full Launch Gameplay Trailer "Survival of the Fittest" | Dec 7th, 2023
snippet.description:
That's right, it's finally here! After a long journey, Undying fully releases on Dec 7th, 2023 with a massive 1.0 update that overhauls the entire game. From story to combat, from survival to dungeons, there's a whole new world to explore, secrets to find, and characters to meet!

Check Undying here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/638990/UNDYING/
